name: Abbazia Deluxe

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for my wife's birthday. We had a canal view room. Not the best view but, hey, it was a view of the canal. Lots of people around during the day but streets outside were empty at night.
reviews.title: Loved the Canal View

likes.disliked: — Up a narrow flight of stairs

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 1 block to the train. Vaporetto just outside the door. Could not ask for anything more.
reviews.title: Luxury at the de Luxe

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Good breakfast. Friendly and accomidating staff.
reviews.title: Brilliant Accommodation

likes.liked: — Its convienient location,quality and friendliness of staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We found this acommodation at the last minute and were more than surprised at the great room and location. Very handy to train stations and water taxi. Great for us to just arrive drop our bags just a short distance from the train and get started on our whirlwind visit of Venice.
reviews.title: What a plesant surprise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were helpful and when not available their sister hotel gave us help with restaurants . It would have been good if they had a list of local highlights worth seeing and I saw an espresso machine but was only offered filter coffee.
reviews.title: Best Option in Venice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was expensive but no more so than other places in Venice or around Italy.
reviews.title: Lovely small hotel in very convenient location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at the Abbazia Deluxe for 3 nights in September 2009. We had stayed at the Abbazia in 2008 and had tried to make reservations there for this trip. Since they were booked they sent us to the De Luxe and we are very pleased that they did.
reviews.title: very modern, decent breakfast, great location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The boutique hotel is located just up the street from the Abbazia. It is very private, just a door with a small sign in the window with no awning or anything else to indicate it is a hotel. In fact we had trouble finding it so we went to the Abbazia and they called over and had someone come and get us. That made the check in process very quick.
reviews.title: Not as billed

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I am surprised that this hotel is not ranked among top 5 or 10 in Venice. It is very near the train station and you might have a little difficulty finding it. The hotel was nicely decorated and room was nice and cosy. There are only 5 rooms and there is a living room where you can have breakfast or watch tv or play PS3.
reviews.title: Great Hotel to stay in Venice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast is served at the living room, you can also have it at their sister hotel (Abbazia Hotel). The spread at Abbazia Hotel is better but I actually prefer to have it at de luxe where you can sit back and enjoy your breakfast.
reviews.title: Great hotel!

reviews.text: There was mix-up in my booking but the lady at the reception was apologetic and was able to resolve it promptly. The service staff serving breakfast was good too and I really enjoyed my stay. I stayed at one night at Abbazia Hotel (which is more expensive and highly ranked) but I would much prefer Abbazia de Luxe instead.
reviews.title: Beautiful, unique, expensive

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This one is a true gem!
reviews.title: Perfect for city break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great location and great, great staff, this hotel was a true gem. Add fast internet and hot water with good pressure along with a comfortable bed. Minibar included in price.
reviews.title: Fabulous place

reviews.text: We stayed for here 2 nights prior to a cruise leaving from Venice. It was a great choice, we were upgraded to the front Grand Canal facing suite, which was great fro people watching, and had fabulous amenities.
reviews.title: A hidden Gem in a stunning location

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The location was important to us as wehad a lot of luggage and it is just one stop on the Vaporetto from Piazzale Roma, or easily walkable (over the new bridge) if you are less encumbered than we were.
reviews.title: Excellent and Stylish Hotel - Abbazia de luxe!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Both before and during our stay, the staff were delightful and so helpful and friendly. We had the option of eating breakfast in the hotel or at the sister hotel next door. Breakfast was plentiful and varied, and service attentive and friendly. The sister hotel has a wonderful garden, and had the weather been a tad warmer we would have eaten breakfast there. It is a former convent and it has a serene atmosphere.
reviews.title: Really great

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our only criticism that the room and foyer were very hot, despite there being no heating on, probably as a result of the restaurant underneath. However, as we had several large opening windows overlooking the Grand Canal we simply opened them and let the noise from the canal filter up into the room. It was quite noisy at night, but we loved to hear the hustle and bustle of the city going on beneath our window, as as we had walked miles during the day nothing disturbed our sleep.
reviews.title: A great choice!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A great stay and we will certainly return to stay here again.
reviews.title: Nice Place to Stay

description: Abbazia de luxe, a bed and breakfast in Venice, in the ambiance of a boutique hotel, close to the train station e with Grand Canal view.
